nodes.excerpt: Upskill in data science by working on projects co-created with tech companies. Remote learning at your pace, supervised by industry experts. Build a portfolio and be work-ready on day one! Pay when employed with an Income Share Agreement (ISA).

nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
nodes.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving

nodes.excerpt: HelloScribe Guru can write a draft on just about any topic - in seconds. Automated writing for long-form content has never been faster, easier, or more convenient. Get off the blank page - say bye-bye writer's block!
nodes.title: HelloScribe Guru - Your AI-powered article writer - for real.

nodes.excerpt: This app is used for writing copy for marketing purposes, such as website content or blog posts. This copy can be customized and unique to each client and can be used immediately on your website. The app uses artificial intelligence (AI) to write amazing copy.
nodes.title: Exty Solutions - AI copywriting that writes everything for you within a click

nodes.excerpt: A text editor where you can type dialogues, add emotions (crying, shouting, hatred, polite, out of breath, etc.). Select from a set of voices (hero, villain, AI, merchant, kid, etc.), add background effects, and export as a human-like voice in studio quality.
nodes.title: SimpleSounds - Human-like AI voices
nodes.author: Tanay Rathore

nodes.excerpt: Personas used by marketing, UX design and research are often based on assumptions or stereotypes. Akin lets you replace old personas with one survey. Create or upload a survey and segment, find trends and insights without hiring a data scientist or consultant.
nodes.title: Akin - Replace personas with data driven clusters through surveys
nodes.author: Sam Straun

nodes.excerpt: Kafkai is a machine-learning algorithm writes articles from scratch. There is no scraping or spinning happening in the background. It allows you to get unique content for cents instead of dollars. It's perfect for bulk content production that SEOs require.
nodes.title: Kafkai 2.0 - Unique and readable content generated by AI

nodes.excerpt: Thundercontent uses artificial intelligence to help you write unique articles on any topic at the speed of light. Spend less money and time, for a better result. Use Thundercontent to write: articles for websites, product pages, blog posts, and more...
nodes.title: Thundercontent - Thundercontent uses AI to help you write articles

nodes.excerpt: TLDR This is a web app (+ chrome extension) that helps you summarize any piece of text into concise, easy to digest content so you can free yourself from information overload.

nodes.excerpt: 100% of your meals show up via delivery service. They perfectly meet your macro and calorie targets. Rank your performance, hunger, and enjoyment and the service gets smarter. Save at least 3.5 hours per week. For most people, it saves 5+ hours per week.

nodes.excerpt: YoMo is an open-source Streaming Serverless Framework for building low-latency edge computing applications. Built atop QUIC transport protocol and functional reactive programming interface, it makes real-time data processing reliable, secure, and easy.
